1339120.name: Staying Together Demo
1339120.description:
Celebrate love and loyalty with Staying Together! A mystical journey awaits you in this multi-character puzzle platformer.

Control two lovers simultaneously in your quest to unite them. Looking out for the needs of a single character won’t get you far, as these inexorable companions move in unison. Only careful planning and cooperation can overcome the obstacles that divide this duo!

  • Explore gorgeous, hand-crafted environments themed from the seasons
  • Progress through many levels loaded with obstacles, traps, and collectibles that will increasingly test your abilities
  • Unlock time attack mode and compete with your friends for the quickest runs
  • Try to survive the gauntlet of hardcore mode as you complete an entire world without ever dying

** In the demo, 5 levels from each world are available **
1339120.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
